bibl.title: Seneca's Medea in Egypt (663-704).
bibl.note: Pieces from the Medea were recycled in the binding of a Coptic vellum ms. (inv. 4972), purchased in 1928. Egypt, IV AD. - Date and Paleography. - Latin in Late Antique Egypt. - Punctuation. - Rubrics. - Marginalia. - Errors and Corrections. - [Text and Notes.]
bibl.seg: MARKUS Donka and Gregg W. SCHWENDNER, Seneca's Medea in Egypt (663-704).

Pieces from the Medea were recycled in the binding of a Coptic vellum ms. (inv. 4972), purchased in 1928. Egypt, IV AD. - Date and Paleography. - Latin in Late Antique Egypt. - Punctuation. - Rubrics. - Marginalia. - Errors and Corrections. - [Text and Notes.]
